verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8055>makes<s%> a father <S%H1>glad,<s%> But a <S%H8055>foolish<s%> <S%H3684>son<s%> is a <S%H1121>grief<s%> to his <S%H8424>mother.<s%>
Ill-gotten <S%H214>gains<s%> do not <S%H3276>profit,<s%> But <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not allow the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to <S%H7456>hunger,<s%> But He will <S%H1920>thrust<s%> [aside] the <S%H1942>craving<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H7326>Poor<s%> is he who <S%H6213>works<s%> with a <S%H9559>negligent<s%> <S%H3709>hand,<s%> But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H9167>diligent<s%> <S%H6238>makes<s%> <S%H6238>rich.<s%>

He who <S%H103>gathers<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> who <S%H7919>acts<s%> <S%H7919>wisely,<s%> [But] he who <S%H7290>sleeps<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> who <S%H954>acts<s%> <S%H954>shamefully.<s%>
<S%H1293>Blessings<s%> are on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
The <S%H2143>memory<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed,<s%> But the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7537>rot.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4687>commands,<s%> But a <S%H8193>babbling<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> will be <S%H3832>thrown<s%> <S%H3832>down.<s%>
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> But he who <S%H6140>perverts<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> will be <S%H3045>found<s%> out.
He who <S%H7169>winks<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5414>causes<s%> <S%H6094>trouble,<s%> And a <S%H8193>babbling<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> will be <S%H3832>thrown<s%> <S%H3832>down.<s%>

The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
<S%H8135>Hatred<s%> <S%H5782>stirs<s%> up <S%H4090>strife,<s%> But <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%>

On the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H995>discerning,<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H4672>found,<s%> But a <S%H7626>rod<s%> is for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of him <S%H2638>who<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
<S%H2450>Wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H6845>store<s%> up <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> But with the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish,<s%> <S%H4288>ruin<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand.<s%>
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> man's <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H7151>fortress,<s%> <S%H5797><s%> The <S%H4288>ruin<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is their <S%H7389>poverty.<s%>
The <S%H6468>wages<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H9132>life,<s%> The <S%H8393>income<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H9128>punishment.<s%>
He is [on] the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H9132>life<s%> who <S%H8104>heeds<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> But he who <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> <S%H9640>reproof<s%> <S%H8582>goes<s%> <S%H8582>astray.<s%>
He who <S%H3680>conceals<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%> [has] <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> And he who <S%H3318>spreads<s%> <S%H1681>slander<s%> is a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

When there are <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H2308>unavoidable,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> But he who <S%H2820>restrains<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> is <S%H7919>wise.<s%>
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is [as] <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is [worth] <S%H4592>little.<s%>
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> But <S%H191>fools<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H2638>lack<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
It is the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H6238>makes<s%> <S%H6238>rich,<s%> And He <S%H3254>adds<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6089>sorrow<s%> to it.
<S%H6213>Doing<s%> <S%H2154>wickedness<s%> is like <S%H7814>sport<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool;<s%> And [so is] <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> to a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
<S%H4034>What<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4034>fears<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> upon him, And the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H5414>granted.<s%>

When the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5674>passes,<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> [has] an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3247>foundation.<s%>
Like <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> and <S%H6227>smoke<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> is the <S%H6102>lazy<s%> <S%H6102>one<s%> to those who <S%H7971>send<s%> him.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3254>prolongs<s%> <S%H3117>life,<s%> But the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H9527>shortened.<s%>
The <S%H8431>hope<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> But the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> perishes.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H8537>upright,<s%> But <S%H4288>ruin<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H1077><s%> be <S%H4131>shaken,<s%> But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will not <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5107>flows<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> But the <S%H8419>perverted<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> out.

The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3045>bring<s%> <S%H3045>forth<s%> <S%H7522>what<s%> is <S%H7522>acceptable,<s%> But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H8419>what<s%> is <S%H8419>perverted.<s%>
